name: Rolly BFJ
description:
Jam Link: Beginner Friendly Jam

Jam Theme: Not enough information

Controls: Mouse and Left Click

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rolly is a golf inspired puzzle platformer game.

Your objective is to complete the levels as quickly and errorless as possible!

Remember the real level layout before shooting. It changes!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
